ComicInfo.Summary:
The sexiest survival action stories in all of comics are back with a new giant sized issue of Jungle Fantasy: Ivory! No one is safe in this prehistoric jungle filled with predators of all shapes and sizes. And Ivory must not only outwit the ferocious thunder lizards that rule this primitive land but also the vile scavengers that lust for her flesh. Jungle Fantasy delivers an all you can eat buffet of racy action and steamy thrills as we devour the luscious art of Renzo Ferrer, and Ron Adrian!
Boundless offers a host of sexy stunning covers with this issue including a Regular Cover by Renato Camilo, Wraparound and Natural Beauty Covers by Raulo Caceres, Luscious and Sultry Covers by Christian Zanier. Plus an array of super limited covers for the collector including a Century Nude (limited to 100 copies) by Juan Jose Ryp and Costume Change Set (limited to 250 sets) by Christian Zanier. And for the erotic art collectors, there is are Nude by Camilo, Sultry Nude, and Luscious Nude by Zanier, Wraparound Nude & Natural Beauty Nude Covers by Caceres, and an Adult Cover by Richard Ortiz!
